thought.text: Good! Let me also test some basic functionality to make sure I haven't broken anything:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpzjbsm4s3/pylint && python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '.')
from pylint.lint.expand_modules import _is_ignored_file
import re

# Test the _is_ignored_file function
ignore_list = []
ignore_list_re = []
ignore_list_paths_re = [re.compile(r'^src/gen/.*$')]

# Test that files in src/gen/ are ignored
assert _is_ignored_file('src/gen/about.py', ignore_list, ignore_list_re, ignore_list_paths_re)
assert _is_ignored_file('src/gen/design.py', ignore_list, ignore_list_re, ignore_list_paths_re)

# Test that files not in src/gen/ are not ignored
assert not _is_ignored_file('src/regular.py', ignore_list, ignore_list_re, ignore_list_paths_re)
assert not _is_ignored_file('other/file.py', ignore_list, ignore_list_re, ignore_list_paths_re)

print('_is_ignored_file tests passed!')
"

function.arguments:
{"command": "cd /tmp/tmpzjbsm4s3/pylint && python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '.')
from pylint.lint.expand_modules import _is_ignored_file
import re

# Test the _is_ignored_file function
ignore_list = []
ignore_list_re = []
ignore_list_paths_re = [re.compile(r'^src/gen/.*$')]

# Test that files in src/gen/ are ignored
assert _is_ignored_file('src/gen/about.py', ignore_list, ignore_list_re, ignore_list_paths_re)
assert _is_ignored_file('src/gen/design.py', ignore_list, ignore_list_re, ignore_list_paths_re)

# Test that files not in src/gen/ are not ignored
assert not _is_ignored_file('src/regular.py', ignore_list, ignore_list_re, ignore_list_paths_re)
assert not _is_ignored_file('other/file.py', ignore_list, ignore_list_re, ignore_list_paths_re)

print('_is_ignored_file tests passed!')
"", "security_risk": "MEDIUM"}
